attributes.action: Social Services to reconsider options and liaise with all parties when family members disagree on the care of elderly parent.
attributes.additional_details:
If one family member wants to care for a parent in their own home and the other family member wishes the parent to go in to a Care Home, social services must not lean towards a Care Home using the "BEST INTEREST CLAUSE." Both family members should be consulted thoroughly.

No decision should be made without all parties concerned being fully informed.
